item.description:
Fix Dock Icon Not Hiding Properly

It's not very fun to play hide and go seek with your dock icons. That's what Rainaissance was doing...until now. The app icon will no longer blink or be there when you don't want it to be. By way of reminder, you can hide the dock icon in the Advanced Settings.

Also, I'm excited to say that Raycast approved the extension for Rainaissance!ðŸŽ‰ You can install by clicking here or by searching for "Rainaissance" the the Raycast extension store.
